body: The documentation in CLI_INTEGRATION.md incorrectly states the default LogDir as 'C:\Users\yolan\sourceepos' but the code shows it's now user-specific. Update the documentation to reflect the actual default value.

Using `[Console]::In.ReadLine()` directly can cause issues if the console input encoding doesn't match the piped data encoding. Consider using `$Host.UI.ReadLine()` or properly configuring the input encoding to handle Unicode characters correctly.
